    #######TASK 
    Provide a factually correct and detailed textual description of the game compiled from the information presented above from different sources, in more than 1000 words.
            "Cap:": represents the captions published in the online portal usually within 30 seconds of the event.
            "E:" represents events recorded exactly after the event happened.
    Don't mention sources of information like commentators or captions, write as if you saw them live.
summary:
On an enthralling night of football, Bayern Munich's relentless attacking prowess was on full display as they decimated Shakhtar Donetsk with a thumping 7-0 victory. The match, which took place at the Allianz Arena, left fans exhilarated as Bayern controlled the game from start to finish, showcasing their superiority in every facet of the game.

The match kicked off with Shakhtar setting the ball rolling, but the proceedings quickly turned in favor of Bayern. Within the first few moments, the ball went out of play twice, resulting in throw-ins for both teams. Bayern Munich then began their aggressive press, and it was only in the 2nd minute that the game's first significant event occurredâ€”a foul committed by a Shakhtar player. This early indiscretion set a negative tone for Shakhtar, and moments later, they found themselves in deeper trouble. Just 37 seconds later, a red card was shown to a Shakhtar player, leaving them a man down in the very early stages of the match.

Bayern took immediate advantage of the numerical supremacy. At the 3rd minute mark, Bayern earned a penalty kick after the red card incident. They capitalized on the opportunity without missing a beat. The ensuing penalty was converted confidently, bolstering the home team's lead to 1-0. The jubilation on the faces of Bayern's players was palpable, and they quickly resumed their high-octane pressing game with near-surgical precision. The next few minutes saw Shakhtar attempting to recover and regain their footing. However, they were unable to penetrate Bayern's defense or midfield, leading to a series of corners and throw-ins that ultimately yielded no significant chances.

Bayern's dominance was further evident when a substitution was forced upon Shakhtar within just 8 minutes of play, a dire reaction to the red card incident. This substitution, however, didn't deter Bayernâ€™s relentless pressure. The Bavarians continued attacking Shakhtarâ€™s goal with a series of shots on target, forcing numerous save attempts and clearances by Shakhtar defenders that were increasingly under strain.

By the 13th minute, Bayern had earned another corner, and fittingly another chance to extend their lead, though it sailed disappointingly off target. Nonetheless, Bayern maintained control, pressing Shakhtar deep into their own half. Shakhtar briefly got an indirect free-kick by the 18th minute following a Bayern foul, but they failed to capitalize, exemplifying their struggles in contending with the technically superior and numerically advantaged German side.

Amidst the relentless Bayern siege, the visitors received another glimmer of hope when Bayernâ€™s aggressive plays led to a yellow card for their own side in the 26th minute. Yet even this failed to turn the tide, as Bayern responded with a barrage of attacks that eventually led to their second goal in the 33rd minute. A beautifully orchestrated play culminated in a well-struck shot that left the Shakhtar goalkeeper helpless. The Allianz Arena roared in delight as Bayern doubled their lead.

The first half continued in a similar vein, with Bayern methodically dismantling Shakhtarâ€™s defensive efforts. A series of throw-ins, corners, and shotsâ€”both on and off targetâ€”ensued from the home side. Shakhtar managed to squeeze in a few counter-attacks and free-kicks, but none of these posed any real threat to Bayernâ€™s goal. The half finished with Bayern firmly in the driverâ€™s seat, nurturing a comfortable lead and showcasing their clinical abilities both offensively and defensively. 

The second half resumed with Bayern Munich initiating the kick-off and immediately continuing their assault on Shakhtarâ€™s beleaguered defense. Within the first three minutes of the second half, Bayern garnered a corner which they capitalized on brilliantly to score their third goal. This marked the beginning of an overwhelming period of dominance, as Bayernâ€™s third goal was quickly followed by a fourth just minutes later, a reflection of their fluid and relentless offensive strategy.

The 6th minute of the second half witnessed yet another kick-off by Shakhtar, who were now four goals down. Shell-shocked, Shakhtar struggled to find any semblance of rhythm or composure as Bayern continued their siege. As the minutes ticked by, a free-kick followed a brief stoppage due to a Bayern foul, which cobbled together a few stoppages and brief interruptions in the play.

Bayern Munichâ€™s fourth goal had not exhausted their desire nor quenched their thirst for goals, and their eagerness translated into further shots on target, notably leading to their fifth goal in the 17th minute of the second half. Again, Shakhtar could barely regroup before the damage was done, and once more Bayern had penetrated their defenses to score, increasing their lead to 5-0 amidst the chants and cheers of their home crowd.

Shakhtar's plight worsened as Bayern maintained overwhelming possession and continued to press high up the pitch. Shots on goal, patient build-ups, and tactical movements characterized Bayern's play, leaving Shakhtar perpetually on the defensive. Even when Shakhtar managed sporadic forays forwardâ€”distinctly isolated moments of attackâ€”they were either caught offside or thwarted efficiently by Bayern's solid defensive unit.

In the 30th minute of the second half, the sixth goal arrived for Bayern Munich. The German outfitâ€™s fantastic interplay, coupled with composure and precision in front of goal, resulted in a finish that drew applause from every corner of the stadium. The scoreline now read a daunting 6-0, reflective of Bayern's uncompromising stranglehold on the match.

Shakhtar, by this point, were seeking only to mitigate the embarrassment, as further substitutions and marginally improved defensive efforts were seen. However, Bayernâ€™s tireless energy and relentless drive saw them continue to pepper the Shakhtar goal.

Finally, in the dying minutes of the second half, Bayern sealed their victory with one last flourishâ€”a seventh goalâ€”in the 41st minute, marking a comprehensive rout of their opponents. Shakhtar, having conceded this many goals, looked to see through the remaining minutes without further damage, as Bayern slowed the pace and maintained possession till the final whistle.

This match underscored Bayern Munichâ€™s exceptional depth, technical prowess, and attacking veracity. Comprehensive in their approach, they exhibited phenomenal teamwork, clinical finishing, and disciplined defense. Each player contributed significantly, marking a consummate team effort and an unforgettable performance for their supporters in the Allianz Arena. 

In essence, Bayern's 7-0 decimation of Shakhtar Donetsk was not just a victoryâ€”it was an exhibition of footballing excellence. As they move forward, carrying the momentum of this massive win, Bayern Munich have surely laid down a marker for their future opponents, emphasizing their status as a force to be reckoned with in European football.
